scripts.examples: turbo run build --filter=@elasticpath/mason-cli... && yarn run scaffold:local:simple
scripts.scaffold:local:simple: mkdir -p examples && cd ./examples && rimraf ./* && node ../packages/mason-cli/dist/bin/mason.js ../packages/d2c-schematics/dist:ep-new --dry-run=false --skip-install=true --skip-git=true --interactive=false --epcc-client-id=abc123 --epcc-client-secret=def456 --epcc-endpoint-url=api.moltin.com basic
